name: Squchy Physics
description:
Developer Comments

The actual version of Squchy Physics features 5 levels and required 2-3 hours of intense coding.  The current version (early access of Squchy Physics development version) was submitted for the Trijam 52 (GameJam) and took  a bit more than 4 hours to make in full, i.e. including concept, building and uploading. 

It will be receiving updates after the voting period of the GameJam.

Game Control

Please click the in-game control buttons to steer the objects and in some levels even gravity !  Camera is controlled by the arrow keys (on your key-pad).

Enjoy, I'll appreciate your feedback.
